about_the_game:
Over 50 pages of comic of stories from To the Moon and Finding Paradise, including:


  • Comic featuring Johnny & River from To the Moon
  • Comic featuring Colin, Faye, & Sofia from Finding Paradise
  • Comic featuring River & Colin from To the Moon & Finding Paradise
  • Various misc. snippets of the SigCorp Doctors
  • Bonus music tracks based on themes from To the Moon & Finding Paradise

(This DLC will be downloaded to To the Moon's Steam folder. To navigate there, right click To the Moon from Steam library -> Property -> Local Files -> Open Local Folder.)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Illustrated by puré
Story by Kan Gao & puré

Physical collector's edition pre-order:

(Rebate available for those who purchased the DLC; instructions within.)

*The main comics in this collection will be made public in the coming weeks; this DLC is for those who'd like to support the project's creation. d-(' ' d-)
*This is the same package as its Finding Paradise counterpart.

short_description: Over 50 pages of comic of stories from To the Moon and Finding Paradise, featuring stories from both the main games and side plots.
